thread.title: Teachers return to Mosul to rebuild education in the wake of ISIS
thread.title_full: Teachers return to Mosul to rebuild education in the wake of ISIS – VICE News

author: Vice News
title: Teachers return to Mosul to rebuild education in the wake of ISIS
text:
Teachers return to Mosul to rebuild education in the wake of ISIS By Vice News on Feb 25, 2017 This segment originally aired Feb. 16, 2017, on VICE News Tonight on HBO.
During the ISIS occupation of Mosul over the last two years, many schools in Mosul had remained open, but taught a curriculum designed by ISIS. As the city is gradually liberated: schools and teachers are now able to teach freely again, and their students are ready to catch up.
VICE News meets with Mosul’s returning teachers to discuss the rehabilitation of education after life under ISIS.
